% Configuration to better between platform compilation
\newcommand\EPUBMODE{0}
\newcommand\PDFMODE{1}

% Theorem
\definecolor{darkjose}{HTML}{4a4a4a}

\RequirePackage[framemethod=default]{mdframed} % Required for creating the theorem, definition, exercise and corollary boxes
% Theorem box
\newmdenv[skipabove=7pt,
skipbelow=7pt,
backgroundcolor=black!5,
linecolor=darkjose,
innerleftmargin=5pt,
innerrightmargin=5pt,
innertopmargin=5pt,
leftmargin=0cm,
rightmargin=0cm,
innerbottommargin=5pt]{tBox}
\usepackage{amsthm}

\usepackage{cleveref}
\usepackage[most]{tcolorbox}
\newtcbtheorem{teorema_nuevo}{Teorema}{
  breakable,
  fonttitle = \bfseries,
  colframe = darkjose,
  colback = black!5
}{thm}

\newenvironment{teorema}[1][]
{
\begin{teorema_nuevo}{#1}{}
}
{\end{teorema_nuevo}}


\newtcbtheorem{definicion_nuevo}{Definición}{
  breakable,
  fonttitle = \bfseries,
  colframe = orange!70,
  colback = orange!5
}{thm}

\newenvironment{definicion}[1][]
{
\begin{definicion_nuevo}{#1}{}
}
{\end{definicion_nuevo}}

\newtcbtheorem{ejemplo_nuevo}{Ejemplo}{
  breakable,
  fonttitle = \bfseries,
  colframe = olive!90,
  colback = olive!20
}{thm}

\newenvironment{ejemplo}[1][]
{
\begin{ejemplo_nuevo}{#1}{}
}
{\end{ejemplo_nuevo}}

\newenvironment{nota}[1][]
{
 \itshape\textbf{Nota: }
}
{}

\newtcbtheorem{proposicion_nuevo}{Proposición}{
  breakable,
  fonttitle = \bfseries,
  colframe = blue!70,
  colback = blue!5
}{thm}

\newenvironment{proposicion}[1][]
{
\begin{proposicion_nuevo}{#1}{}
}
{\end{proposicion_nuevo}}

\newtcbtheorem{corolario_nuevo}{Corolario}{
  breakable,
  fonttitle = \bfseries,
  colframe = cyan!70,
  colback = cyan!5
}{thm}

\newenvironment{corolario}[1][]
{
\begin{corolario_nuevo}{#1}{}
}
{\end{corolario_nuevo}}

\newenvironment{solucion}[1][]
{
\textbf{Solución #1:} \emph
}
{}
